attributes.title: The Direction of RWBY
attributes.caption: Join your hosts Kerry Shawcross and the directors of RWBY, Paula Decanini, Dustin Matthews, and Connor Pickens as they discuss the ins and outs of RWBY!
attributes.description: Join your hosts Kerry Shawcross and the directors of RWBY, Paula Decanini, Dustin Matthews, and Connor Pickens as they discuss the ins and outs of RWBY!

attributes.title: Bringing Remnant to Life
attributes.caption: Join your hosts Kerry Shawcross and some of our very talented RWBY artists, Erin Winn, Christine Stuckart, and Gio Coutinho as they discuss the art of RWBY!
attributes.description: Join your hosts Kerry Shawcross and some of our very talented RWBY artists, Erin Winn, Christine Stuckart, and Gio Coutinho as they discuss the art of RWBY!

attributes.title: 50 shades of RWBY
attributes.caption: Join your host Kerry Shawcross as he interrogates a bunch of RWBY's fantastic modeling and post artists on how they make the show look the way it looks!
attributes.description: Join your host Kerry Shawcross as he interrogates a bunch of RWBY's fantastic modeling and post artists on how they make the show look the way it looks!

attributes.title: It All Starts with Boards
attributes.caption: Join your host Kerry Shawcross as figures out how the talented board, camera, and layout artists cram all the story into RWBY.
attributes.description: Join your host Kerry Shawcross as figures out how the talented board, camera, and layout artists cram all the story into RWBY.
attributes.display_title: S1:E4 - It All Starts with Boards

attributes.title: Animating RWBY
attributes.caption: Join your host Kerry Shawcross as he tries to decipher how the talented animators make RWBY look so good!
attributes.description: Join your host Kerry Shawcross as he tries to decipher how the talented animators make RWBY look so good!

attributes.title: RWBY Gets Edited
attributes.caption: Join your host Kerry Shawcross as he attempts to decode everything the editors, mixers, and engineers do to make RWBY what it is!
attributes.description: Join your host Kerry Shawcross as he attempts to decode everything the editors, mixers, and engineers do to make RWBY what it is!

attributes.title: PRO Producers on RWBY!
attributes.caption: Join your host Kerry Shawcross as he struggles to comprehend all the tiny details our studio heads and lead producer have to keep track of while making RWBY!
attributes.description: Join your host Kerry Shawcross as he struggles to comprehend all the tiny details our studio heads and lead producer have to keep track of while making RWBY!

attributes.title: Always Take Notes / The Rock Would Be Great On Me
attributes.caption: Join your host Kerry Shawcross as he talks to the writers of RWBY about how they never make mistakees!
attributes.description: Join your host Kerry Shawcross as he talks to the writers of RWBY about how they never make mistakees!
attributes.display_title: S1:E8 - Always Take Notes / The Rock Would Be Great On Me
